mapper.insert: insert into BookList (category, title, writer, price, pay_method, arrived_date, photo, month) values (#{category}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{price}, #{pay_method}, #{arrived_date}, #{photo}, #{month})
mapper.update: update BookList set category = #{category}, title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, price = #{price}, pay_method = #{pay_method}, arrived_date = #{arrived_date} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from BookList order by seq desc
select * from BookList order by month desc
select from BookList where title like '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
